title: Kayles Design Poll
body:
I'm seeing a lot of mixed reviews on Kayle. I think overall aside from her oddly placed wings Morgana hit close to the mark while Kayle seems to be all over the place. 

Let me know what you think.
What do you think about Kayles overall aesthetic design? 
The options are. 

Excellent: Aside from minor adjustments (like bigger wings), the overall design is great!

More Armor: The most common complain is that she is missing too much armor, primarily around her lower torso/abdomen. This option would just be slapping chunks/armor/garments onto her new design. 

Overhaul: Heavily modify both the feeling and aesthetics of the armor. Completely revamp it. 

If you want to get more into detail or feel I should add another option leave a comment.

Her wings can actually be larger without a larger wingspan.  I linked this in another thread: https://www.deviantart.com/twarda8/art/Wing-basics-783734359

The leading edge gap takes so much presence away from the wings, but filling in those gaps won't make her wings affect her overall model size.  Her wings could stay small in proportion to her entire model, but be much larger than they are now if the wings are more realistically modeled.

Bigger wings = smaller model

Look at the art and see how the biggest jutting thing is positioned on his upper arm just under the shoulder?

Even if the lames overlap, if you move his arm perpendicular to the ground, then there’s nothing it can fold into to change the angle from making that huge metal plate move into his head. Since its ground is the upper arm itself. 

Interestingly if the metal plate was higher up on the actual shoulder this wouldn’t be as much of a problem. Of course he still couldn’t look over his shoulder which is kind of important in sword fighting. But at least he’s not hurting himself directly.

I'm not satisfied with the tentative state of Kayle's update.  The wings don't look functional.  Sure, they flap, but they lack the proper shape to do so.  While it's a nitpick, the departure from functional wing shapes is emphasized with the new design.  Her face, while not really an issue from a player's camera view, has a jarringly inhuman look (and not in an ethereal/heavenly way).  Her breastplate design makes me feel like I'm looking at an underaged gymnast, which is exacerbated by the prominence of her cuisses, which give the illusion of a fuller ass and thighs.  The contrast is dissonant.  Jinx's flatness doesn't cause that  visual discomfort.

I think more armor and a return to her gold and red colour scheme. I'm not a huge fan of her hair colour or her hairstyle either. I think it should be less punky and more practical, otherwise it's ok.

I voted for overhaul. Loved the multiple wings, so they could stay (although maybe a little bit bigger would help), but she needs more armor. I would also do a big revamp for the armor design and the white/gold color scheme in general, since she looked a bit too much like Galio for my tastes. Perhaps maybe try to give her a different body shape, face shape, or hair style while I'm at it (her old hair style suited her way better, and while the face isn't the biggest deal with Kayle, to me the only requirement that needs to stay is that she needs to look somewhat like Morgana. And I'm sure it wouldn't kill Riot for both of them to have a slightly more diverse face from the other female characters).

Ah, I get what you're saying. I honestly don't mind them not putting a lot of detail into the face in-game since it is hard to see it there. I guess I was trying to say I would like to see them making her face more unique in other mediums such as splash art, comics, cinematics, etc., since there you can put much more focus on the face.

As for the Demacian thing, I do suppose you have a point. Perhaps the colors are supposed to show how much Kayle has influenced Demacia while Morgana has little to no aesthetic similarities to the country, signifying how Demacia favored one sister while shunning the other. But I think I personally would have preferred it if both sisters had a little bit of Demacia's style to them, but had enough differences from it that they stood out. In my opinion, it would work because while both sisters aren't directly from Demacia like the other characters, they still are linked to the country.

Personally would love to see the following:

* bigger wings
* more armor

Someone rather eloquently said that her lack of sexual features was a contrast to her sister.  I’m guessing the work required at this point may be impossible, but I hope Riot at least tries.

You say it like Riot will release like that.

Unfortunately there is a history of these looking very close to the final product there are rare cases that they pull the changes and try again, but Riot as of recent has not even done that with items or cheap skins. Aatrox and riven are good examples of them changing something before, but those were very minor in comparison to what is being asked for with Kayle.

Not that I disagree that Kayle might need a bit more work, but at this point in order to address the pain points that people are bringing up, Rito would need to change the model itself and not just update the textures. This means updating animations too, which would probably significantly setback Kayle's release date. Some people may say that that's worth it, but I kinda want to play the new Kayle sooner rather than later.

I don't want to be overly critical, maybe my expectations for their reworks were way too high.

I miss Kayle's armor (or anything will do instead of that tight suit/spandex); large, majestic wings; long, flowing, golden hair (or white) even if I only say it in a couple of skins.

I miss Morg's large, tattered wings and her long hair was better for me too,  although won't mind it being shorter if it hadn't looked as much as Xayah's.

I don't like the way they seem to have repurposed stuff from other characters such as Xayah, Evalyn, Dawnbringer Riven, Super Galaxy Shyvana, Bullet Angel Kai'Sa, and [Star Guardian Soraka's "butt" wings](http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/artwork/star-guardian-soraka-25/).

Those shoulders have got to go, so I voted for 'overhaul' here. Why would people play the champ if the default skin looks bad? Even if the shoulder armor looks normal on every other skin, which would be a good thing mind you, it would still make Riot seem cheap.
